Package org.bloomreach.forge.brut.components.annotation

Annotation Interface BrxmComponentTest

@Target(TYPE) @Retention(RUNTIME) @ExtendWith(BrxmComponentTestExtension.class) @TestInstance(PER_CLASS) public @interface BrxmComponentTest
Annotation for HST component tests with zero-configuration defaults.

Important: BRUT must be declared with <scope>test</scope> in your POM. BRUT replaces core HST beans with test-oriented implementations. Without test scope, these mock beans will be on the runtime classpath and will shadow production beans, causing real endpoints to stop working.

Tests using this annotation automatically get:

  • Lifecycle management (setup/teardown)
  • Auto-detected bean scanning from project settings or test package
  • Default skeleton repository data when no test resource is specified

  • Optional Element Summary

  • Element Details

    • beanPackages

      String[] beanPackages
      Bean class package patterns for HST content bean scanning.

      If empty (default), auto-detects packages based on project settings or test package conventions.

      Returns:
      bean package names
      Default:
      {}

    • testResourcePath

      String testResourcePath
      YAML test resource path to import before each test.

      If empty (default), uses the framework skeleton repository data.

      Returns:
      test resource path
      Default:
      ""

    • nodeTypes

      String[] nodeTypes
      Node types to register before test execution.

      Auto-detection: When empty (default), node types are automatically detected by scanning beanPackages() for classes annotated with @Node(jcrType="..."). This eliminates the need to manually specify types that are already defined in your bean classes.

      Explicit override: Specify types manually when you need:

      • Type inheritance: "ns:ChildType extends ns:ParentType"
      • Types not defined in scanned bean packages

      Example with inheritance: {"ns:NewsPage extends ns:AnotherType", "ns:AnotherType"}

      Returns:
      node type definitions to register (empty for auto-detection)
      Default:
      {}

    • content

      String content
      YAML content resource path to import before each test.

      Example: "/news.yaml"

      Returns:
      content resource path
      Default:
      ""

    • contentRoot

      String contentRoot
      Target path where content is imported. Also sets site content base path.

      Example: "/content/documents/mychannel"

      Returns:
      content root path
      Default:
      ""
